## Collections.KeyValueConverters.convertValue() method

Converts a supplied unknown to a valid value of type `<TV>`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
convertValue(key: unknown): DetailedResult<TV, ResultMapResultDetail>;
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

unknown


</td><td>

The unknown to be converted.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[DetailedResult](./ts-utils.detailedresult.md)<!-- -->&lt;TV, [ResultMapResultDetail](./ts-utils.collections.resultmapresultdetail.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted value and 'success' detail if the value is valid, or `Failure` with an error message and 'invalid-value' detail if the value is invalid.
